title: Come check out this four bedroom and 2.5 bathroom townhouse
description: Come check out this four bedroom and 2.5 bathroom townhouse in a great centralized location in Washington Sq West. One block from Broad Street and a view of Kimmel Center from the third floor. Great backyard off the kitchen, central air, hardwood floors throughout. Three bedrooms on second floor, primary bedroom suite on third floor with walk-in closet and beautiful bath. Laundry in the basement! Move right in and enjoy this quiet home convenient to all that Philadelphia has to offer! There is a $50/month water fee. $3,200/month rent INCLUDES internet and security system!!

title: 1st Fl Studio/Office great live/work space wd fl,SS appl storage loft
description:
123 N 20th Street is a renovated 4 story townhouse apartment building located on a charming residential street in the Rittenhouse/Logan Square area of Center City Philadelphia.  This four-story boutique building only has 6 apartments and features a newly refirbished apts, many with private Decks, a NEW shared ROOFDECK & side/rear Patio, and NEW laundry facilities. All amenities are exclusive to 123 N 20th Street residents. The building is on an architecturally stunning historic block and is conveniently located just off ARCH St a block and a half up from NEW Rite Aid and CVS Pharmacies, and WAWA(largest in the City) now open on Market 1 block from the Wine and Spirits store. Or shop/dine at all the best at the food court at the Comcast tower just a couple blocks down Arch Street. 99 Walk score, 100 Transit Score, 96 Bike score!
This unique vintage building has all of the historic charm of a converted townhouse mansion, with modern conveniences of brand NEW apartment kitchens.  Updated bathrooms and NEW individual gas heaters, and portable AC units provided!
The building is managed by the Owner who lives/works a few blocks away and is readily available to provide professional customer service. Be the 1st to enjoy new finishes, appliances, flooring refinished walls, and common area.
Feel free to schedule an appointment afternoon/evenings on weekdays or Weekend mornings.

DWELL is on your left-hand side at the corner of 2nd and Thompson Streets.

title: Charming 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment for rent!
description: Charming 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment located near University of Penn! - This is a charming 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment located near University of Penn in the Cedar Park neighborhood of West Philadelphia.Upon entering, you have a very large common space, including the living room, dining area, and kitchen when you walk in on the 3rd floor. It features wall to wall carpet and lots of sunlight. The kitchen has a gas stove and refrigerator. The 2 bedroom are full carpeted and have built-in cloests. The bathroom is fully tiled with a tub/shower and under-the-sink storage.There is a shared porch located on the front of the home.There is a shared washer and dryer located in the building.This unit has radiant heat.This property is located very close to many shops and restaurants along Baltimore Ave. and just a block to Cedar Park. Also close to trolley and bus stops.Tenants are responsible for gas and electric.If interested, please call the number attached to this listing.

title: 2 bedroom, 2 bath home in Philadelphia's east side!!
description:
This wonderful brick 2 bedroom, 2 bath home features a basement and a large backyard and can be found on Evansville's east side. The large living room welcomes you with beautiful wood flooring. The dining area also includes wood flooring and an eye-catching focal wall with wood beams and industrial iron rods that are perfect for hanging artwork. The kitchen includes new tile flooring, beautiful white cabinets, a black backsplash and a gas stove. The full basement offers a good sized finished room with a fireplace and could be used as a recreation or family room. An additional finished room in the basement could be a home office or a 3rd bedroom, but it does not have a closet. Other amenities include a nice front porch, a 2 car garage and a deep yard at 231 feet.
If you really like it and interested to rent please reply with your number.
Thanks

title: Live the Lifestyle You Deserve!
description:
Apt. 5111 — Ascott floor plan — 1,230 sq. ft. — $3,275
This 1st floor corner-unit apartment has so much to offer! Our brand-new construction includes white quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, recessed lighting throughout, luxury plank flooring in the living areas and plush carpeting in the bedrooms. This Ascott also features spacious walk-in closets with custom shelving and ample living/dining room space. This beautiful apartment home is within close proximity is our clubhouse that features a 24-hour fitness center, theatre room, resort-style swimming pool, and so much more!
